content:
If you like H&M, you'll love these affordable fashion brands that offer similar styles and quality at budget-friendly prices. Here are some options:

1. **Uniqlo**: Known for their high-quality basics, Uniqlo offers trendy and functional clothing at affordable prices. Their HEATTECH and AIRism lines are popular for their innovative technology and comfort.
2. **Zara**: While slightly pricier than H&M, Zara offers on-trend fashion with a focus on quality and durability. Their TRF line is a more affordable option with fast-fashion pieces.
3. **Old Navy**: This American brand offers fashionable clothing at unbeatable prices. They have a wide range of styles, from basics to trendy pieces, for men, women, and kids.
4. **Forever 21**: Similar to H&M, Forever 21 offers the latest fashion trends at affordable prices. They have a vast selection of clothing, shoes, and accessories for men and women.
5. **ASOS**: While primarily an online retailer, ASOS offers a vast range of fashionable clothing at affordable prices. They have a "ASOS Design" line with trendy pieces, as well as collaborations with popular brands.
6. **Cotton On**: This Australian brand offers on-trend fashion at affordable prices. They have a wide range of clothing, shoes, and accessories for men, women, and kids.
7. **Target**: Target has upped their fashion game in recent years, offering stylish clothing at affordable prices. Their Cat & Jack line is popular for kids, and their Who What Wear collection is a fashion-forward collaboration.
8. **Madewell**: While slightly pricier than H&M, Madewell offers high-quality denim and trendy, yet timeless, fashion pieces at a slightly higher price point.
9. **Topshop**: This UK-based brand offers fashionable clothing with a focus on quality and style. Their Topman line is popular for men's fashion.
10. **Boohoo**: Another online retailer, Boohoo offers fast fashion at affordable prices with a wide range of styles and frequent sales.

These brands offer a mix of trendy and timeless pieces, and many have online shopping options with affordable shipping or in-store pickup. Happy shopping!
